verses.verse: God <WH430> of my praise, <WH8416> don't <WH2790> remain silent,
for they have opened <WH6605> the mouth <WH6310> of the wicked <WH7563> and the mouth <WH6310> of deceit <WH4820> against me. <WH1696> They have spoken to me with a lying <WH8267> tongue. <WH3956>
They have also surrounded <WH5437> me with words <WH1697> of hatred, <WH8135> and fought <WH3898> against me without a cause. <WH2600>
In return for my love, <WH160> they are my adversaries; <WH7853> but I am in prayer. <WH8605>
They have rewarded <WH7760> me evil <WH7451> for good, <WH2896> and hatred <WH8135> for my love. <WH160>
Set <WH6485> a wicked man <WH7563> over him. <WH7854> Let an adversary stand <WH5975> at his right hand. <WH3225>
When he is judged, <WH8199> let him come forth <WH3318> guilty. <WH7563> Let his prayer <WH8605> be turned into sin. <WH2401>
Let his days <WH3117> be few. <WH4592> Let another <WH312> take <WH3947> his office. <WH6486>
Let his children <WH1121> be fatherless, <WH3490> and his wife <WH802> a widow. <WH490>
Let his children <WH1121> be wandering <WH5128> beggars. <WH5128> <WH7592> Let them be sought <WH1875> from their ruins. <WH2723>
Let the creditor <WH5383> seize <WH5367> all that he has. <WH2114> Let strangers plunder <WH962> the fruit of his labor. <WH3018>
Let there be no one to extend <WH4900> kindness <WH2617> to him, <WH2603> neither let there be anyone to have pity on his fatherless children. <WH3490>
Let his posterity <WH319> be cut off. <WH3772> In the generation <WH1755> following <WH312> let their name <WH8034> be blotted out. <WH4229>
Let the iniquity <WH5771> of his fathers <WH1> be remembered <WH2142> by Yahweh. <WH3068> Don't <WH2403> let the sin of his mother <WH517> be blotted out. <WH4229>
Let them be before Yahweh <WH3068> continually, <WH8548> that he may cut off <WH3772> their memory <WH2143> from the earth; <WH776>

because he didn't <WH2142> remember to show <WH6213> kindness, <WH2617> but persecuted <WH7291> the poor <WH6041> and needy <WH34> man, <WH376> the broken <WH3512> in heart, <WH3824> to kill them. <WH4191>
Yes, <WH157> he loved cursing, <WH7045> and it came <WH935> to him. <WH2654> He didn't delight in blessing, <WH1293> and it was far from him. <WH7368>
He clothed <WH3847> himself also with cursing <WH7045> as with his garment. <WH4055> It came <WH935> into his inward <WH7130> parts like water, <WH4325> like oil <WH8081> into his bones. <WH6106>
Let it be to him as the clothing <WH899> with which he covers <WH5844> himself, <WH4206> for the belt that is always <WH8548> around him. <WH2296>
This is the reward <WH6468> of my adversaries <WH7853> from Yahweh, <WH3068> of those who speak <WH1696> evil <WH7451> against my soul. <WH5315>
But deal <WH6213> with me, <WH136> Yahweh the Lord, <WH136> for your name <WH8034>'s sake, <WH2617> because your loving kindness is good, <WH2896> deliver me; <WH5337>
for I am poor <WH6041> and needy. <WH34> My heart <WH3820> is wounded <WH2490> within me. <WH7130>
I fade away <WH1980> like an evening <WH5186> shadow. <WH6738> I am shaken off <WH5287> like a locust. <WH697>
My knees <WH1290> are weak <WH3782> through fasting. <WH6685> My body <WH1320> is thin <WH3584> and lacks fat. <WH8081>
I have also become a reproach <WH2781> to them. <WH7200> When they see me, <WH5128> they shake their head. <WH7218>
Help <WH5826> me, <WH3068> Yahweh, my God. <WH430> Save <WH3467> me according to your loving kindness; <WH2617>
that they may know <WH3045> that this is your hand; <WH3027> that you, <WH3068> Yahweh, have done it. <WH6213>
They may curse, <WH7043> but you bless. <WH1288> When they arise, <WH6965> they will be shamed, <WH954> but your servant <WH5650> shall rejoice. <WH8055>
Let my adversaries <WH7853> be clothed <WH3847> with dishonor. <WH3639> Let them cover <WH5844> themselves with their own shame <WH1322> as with a robe. <WH4598>
I will give great <WH3966> thanks <WH3034> to Yahweh <WH3068> with my mouth. <WH6310> Yes, <WH1984> I will praise him among <WH8432> the multitude. <WH7227>
For he will stand <WH5975> at the right hand <WH3225> of the needy, <WH34> to save <WH3467> him from those who judge <WH8199> his soul. <WH5315>
